metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25440 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the add contact function CiviCRM 5.59.alpha1, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in first/second name field.

criterions.comment: civicrm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
